<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hellspawn](/Feats.aspx?ID=1381) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 40 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your lineage descends from [devils](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30), the conniving schemers of [Hell's](/Planes.aspx?ID=18) malevolent hierarchy. You're as skilled at noticing lies and twisted wordings as you are at constructing them. You are trained in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) and [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8). If you were already trained in Deception (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the [Lie to Me](/Feats.aspx?ID=811) skill feat.

<title level="2">Hellspawn leads to...</title>
[Devil Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1389)
name: Hellspawn
